definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

pinyin: guo2 nei4 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2
guo2 min2 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2

sentences.english: Too much of the nation's G. D. P. is siphoned into a few hands.
sentences.chinese: 國家大部分的國內生產總值集中流入一部分人手中。

sentences.english: Its per capita GDP remains one of the lowest in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 它的人均國內生產總值爲歐洲最低的之一。

sentences.english: GDP has lurched sickeningly downward, but employment has not.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值急劇下滑，但就業率還算大致穩定。

sentences.english: GDP growth rate is calculated at comparable prices.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值增長速度按可比價格計算。

sentences.english: It had a private savings rate of 15pc of GDP.
sentences.chinese: 它的私人儲蓄率佔到國內生產總值的15%。

sentences.english: The per capita GDP in Kenya is just $783 a year.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亞的年人均國內生產總值只有783美元。

sentences.english: Altogether, the losses amounted to 200 percent of Grenada’s gross domestic product.
sentences.chinese: 全部損失高達格林納達國內生產總值的200%。

sentences.english: In 2010, Ningxia’s GDP totaled 164.3 billion yuan.
The president said that the gross national product had declined by a big margin.
sentences.chinese: 總統說國民生產總值已大幅度下降。

sentences.english: Growth rates for Gross Domestic Product are calculated at comparable prices.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值增長速度按可比價格計算。

sentences.english: The growth rates of GDP are calculated at comparable prices. The same as in the following tables.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值增長速度按可比價格計算，下表同。

sentences.english: The Greek economy is just 2% of European GDP and an even tinier proportion of global GDP.
sentences.chinese: 它的國內生產總值僅佔歐洲2%，遑論全球了。

sentences.english: Although our per capita GNP will not amount to much and will mean only a comparatively comfortable living standard.
sentences.chinese: 國民生產總值按人口平均不算多，叫做小康水平。

sentences.english: I'd like to see the top 10 countries' debts to all of the others --- in % of GNP. That would be more meaningful than this.
sentences.chinese: 我想看前十的國家所持國債佔國民生產總值的比例。

sentences.english: The combined debt equaled 42% of the nation's gross domestic product.
sentences.chinese: 這些債務加起來相當於美國國內生產總值的42%。

sentences.english: In 2010, Jiangxi’s GDP totaled 943.5 billion yuan.
sentences.chinese: 2010年江西實現地區生產總值9435億元。

pinyin: guo2 nei4 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2
guo2 min2 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
